Minimal

Source: vignettes/minimal.Rmd
minimal.Rmd
library(hello)

Say hello to someone

You can say hello to someone in particular using say_hello().

say_hello() # Hello Berra
#> Hello Berra
#> Hello Berra
say_hello(someone = "Seb") # Hello Seb
#> Hello Seb
#> Hello Seb

hello_anna <- say_hello(someone = "Anna") 
#> Hello Anna
hello_anna
#> Hello Anna
# library(ggplot2)
# ggplot() + geom_point()

say_goodbye 

say_goodbye()
#> NULL
